gobblin.runtime.api

Interface SpecCatalogListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    SpecCompiler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpecCatalog.StandardMetrics, SpecCatalogListenersList

    public interface SpecCatalogListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SpecCatalogListener.AddSpecCallback
      A standard implementation of onAddSpec as a functional object
      static class  SpecCatalogListener.DeleteSpecCallback
      A standard implementation of onDeleteSpec as a functional object
      static class  SpecCatalogListener.UpdateSpecCallback 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAddSpec(Spec addedSpec)
      Invoked when a new Spec is added to the catalog and for all pre-existing specs on registration of the listener.
      void onDeleteSpec(URI deletedSpecURI, String deletedSpecVersion)
      Invoked when a Spec gets removed from the catalog.
      void onUpdateSpec(Spec updatedSpec)
      Invoked when the contents of a Spec gets updated in the catalog.
